SavedPaymentMethodEvent.name: SavedPaymentMethodEvent
SavedPaymentMethodEvent.description: Represents a saved payment method platform event. Subscribe to these events so you can listen and respond to them when theyâ€™re published. For example, create a Salesforce Flow that is triggered when one of these events is published.

ChangeType.description: Type of saved payment method event, which triggers an event notification. You can write code to operate conditionally on the value of this field. For example, you can ignore a create change but get notified of updates.

SavedPaymentMethodId.description: Identifies the SavedPaymentMethod record for which the event occurs.
